attributes.action: dont charge work vehicles to use roads because you cannot carry goods on public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the govenment speak about using public transport an then will charge all vehicles even work vehicles

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
